description: This file defines a React functional component called Sidebar, which displays a list of notes with functionalities to select or create a new note. It handles loading states, active note highlighting, and displays note details such as title, last updated date, and content snippet.

methods.name: Sidebar({ notes, selectedId, onSelect, onCreate, loading })
methods.description: React functional component for displaying a list of notes with options to select or create notes.

ctags.name: Sidebar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Sidebar({ notes, selectedId, onSelect, onCreate, loading }) {$/
